message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square!
You're lowballing, I'm the one who's fair and square now!
You said I was lowballing, now it's your turn to be fair!
You're not serious about being fair, I'm taking control now!
You want to take control? Let's see how you like it!
You're playing hardball, I'll show you my strength now!
You want to show your strength? Let's see if you can handle a little more!
You think you can handle more? I'll show you what a real negotiation looks like!
You want to show me what a real negotiation looks like? I'll show you what desperation looks like!
You're running out of options, it's time to get serious!
You want me to get serious? I'm getting desperate, and I'll take what I can get!
